website_summaries.verdict: An exceptional screen and a long list of software goodies make the Galaxy Tab S Samsung's best tablet to date and our top Android choice for an entertainment slate.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S rocks a vividly colorful, razor-sharp screen and exclusive software perks in an ultra-thin and lightweight design
cons: Starting at $500 or £400, it's a high-end purchase
Touchscreen response can lag if many of its memory-hogging apps are open in the background

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This was originally a Verizon tablet. I just wanted a tablet without the brand. So there is unwanted Verizons apps I don't need taking up space. Also having problems with it so I think it could be refurbished. If I try to take any photos with it, the display keeps spinning. I can't make it stop. So not able to take photos. Going to call amazon. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, high feature set
customer_reviews.text: This Samsung Galaxy S has a superior camera, fast CPU, and better screen resolution than more recent tablets. The reason is that it was originally branded and subsidized by Veriz....., the phone company. It was intended to have a cell chip and be on a cell plan but the cell company bought more than they could sell. It works fine without a SIM chip on WiFi and the features and specs are better than unsubsidized tablets. It's sold as refurbished but my appeared new.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, and not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Item was advertised as new. It wasn't. There were some scratches along the edge of the tablet, but at least the screen was good. The tablet also seemed to be a much older version than what it was advertised as, and it's already taking a long time to charge up the battery. So all in all, I'm pretty sure I got hosed with this purchases, especially for the price I paid ($565+). Will never buy another electronic device off of Amazon again. It's far too risky.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, but if you are used to the Ipad stick with it
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet in almost every way, however, coming from an Ipad i was not able to adjust to the slight lags in the UI and the general lack of quality apps on the android market place. I used it for about a week before deciding to return and bought an ipad air. I dont understand why the liquid smoothness of the IPad UI is unattainable on such a powerful tablet. If you are an android afficionado, this is just the tablet for you. I can imagine the performance once you root it and rip out the custom UI. Also, the additional SD card slot can go upto 128gb (you are stuck with whatever size Ipad you buy).
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to play with. I have no complaints about brightness, responsiveness, battery life, or image quality and resolution. He uses it daily and loves it. I'd provide a more thorough review if it was for my own personal use, but as things are, this was meant to serve as entertainment for a child and it is serving that purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Kuahara

customer_reviews.title: It has great storage
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet for around 5 years and I love it. It has great storage. I have over 40 apps and it runs perfectly. I use this tablet for work while i'm in meetings and i use at home for cooking recipes and to watch Netflix. I enjoy the sleek design and durability of this table. The screen size is very nice. Easy to charge. This product is very helpful in my daily life.
customer_reviews.author: Supernatural9

customer_reviews.title: Was afraid, but not anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Came with two fine scratches on the screen, but for two hundred bux, that's acceptable cause I knew it wasn't new, I needed something to binge watch netflix with while in bed, without it being too heavy as to cause significant trauma if dropped on my face. Plus I don't want it to be too expensive where I had to be so gentle with it, this was perfect, right between my S7 and IPadpro (productivity tablet). My only fear was that they would send me a non working tablet whereby I would have to pay a restocking fee as some kind of hot potato like scam. Happy with purchase and with seller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Snarf Snarf

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet, Beautiful Display
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tablet for almost 3 years and it's still going strong. The display is probably one of the best tablet displays I've ever seen, even now three years later thanks to the amoled tech. The storage space is low but with the expandable drive it's not too much of a concern. It would be nice if Samsung enabled adoptable storage so that you could use it system wide but they have yet to do so. It runs plenty fast, playing any 1080p video I have thrown at it. All in all I highly recommend this, even at three years old.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: love it! The one that works great is Wifi ...
customer_reviews.text: After 10 days I'm going to have to return it as it keeps rebooting over and over. Clearing the cache and factory reset did nothing. This is our 2nd Samsung S 10.5, the first is nearly 2 years old and has been flawless, love it! The one that works great is Wifi only, the one we're having reboot problems with is loaded with carrier bloatware. Does any one know if that could be part of the problem?
customer_reviews.author: Mel B.

customer_reviews.title: A great tool for active professionals.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a Galaxy Tab Pro that was stolen. It's definitely a stronger piece of tech. The battery life has been much better. It's very functional for video watching and I really appreciate being able to swap out memory cards(I'm looking at you Apple...). I really appreciate being able to fill and edit PDFs directly on the screen, even being able to get signatures from clients on the spot. It has become an indispensable tool for my business and play.
customer_reviews.author: Loki965

customer_reviews.title: Twas the night before Christmas....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet as a gift for Christmas for my significant other. He loves it! I also purchased a keyboard case and protective shield for the touch screen. He uses it everyday for music, games and checking weather and news. When I purchased it, it was delivered as promised! The packaging was sturdy and not damaged! (I worried about that with the rush of Christmas deliveries by our carrier.) The price was perfect! I see many happy moments ahead as he uses it for his business as well as for capturing photos of the cabinetry that he builds! A great gift! I highly recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought refurbished. I love my tablet. It's huge and beautiful. The only thing I have found wrong with it (probably because it is refurbished) is that the screen occasionally does not respond. In order to resolve this, I simply press the power button to turn the screen off, and then press to turn the screen on again. Bought a bluetooth keyboard case to go with it, and it pairs wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear vibrant display
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this tablet. The image quality is amazing. Long lasting battery. I take it with me wherever I go. I'm a first time tablet user. I is a lot of research in deciding which tablet to buy. While the iPad clearly gets a lot of great reviews, in testing out both products in a store I couldn't help like this tablet better. The image quality is so much brighter and very crisp. Like looking at the world through glass. I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Tom

customer_reviews.title: It worked great after that and I loved it until early Dec
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4/2016. By July, it had completely frozen. The seller told me to do a hard reboot, which I did, losing everything on the tablet. It worked great after that and I loved it until early Dec., when it stopped charging. It looks like the charging port needs to be replaced. The seller denies all responsibility citing a 6 month cut-off for returns. I looked into the seller a little further and they operate a series of pawn shops (NY?). The tablet was advertised as new. When I started it initially there was no start-up information required and frankly, I now think it was actually used (pawned). Beware.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: wow what an experience, I am officially an ex ipad user.
customer_reviews.text: Officially I am now an ex-Ipad user. Wow, what a wonderful experience so far. Set up was easy and this is someone who is not techical. Movies are wonderful to watch on this tablet, which we use Netflix streaming. Even the speakers are not bad, but can attach external speakers r to enhance the expereince. I am impressed with thelightnesss, it is lighter than the Ipad air. For now, this is a terrific tablet for the money. And I can increase the memory.
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely Yours

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sensible platform for mobile editing and presenting photos and this fit the bill. I have a totally portable and efficient system. To round out the capabilities I also purchased: Samsung 64GB EVO Class 10 Micro SDXC Bobj Rugged Case Inateck Multi-in-1 OTG Adapter LinkS 10 feet Micro USB to HDMI MHL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't be in Doubt about this
customer_reviews.text: Got the Dazzling White Samsung S 10.5 factory sealed and I'm now a believer. Amazing Device,Amazing PPI RESOLUTION and Amazing Picture Quality in my opinion,288 PPI that's really good,you can't distinguish the pixels almost at all,Very portable thin device Good sound speakers . The seller sent it very fast And now I am updating my Tablet to Android 6.0 and that gives it many many improvements and faster performance than before. I'm a Happy Person
customer_reviews.author: dima b

customer_reviews.title: So impressive and great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have owned and purchased every ipad and iPod available for myself and family. This tablet was quite a different purchase and I was very hesitant . In the evening I watch movies and TV shows and I was blown away with the stunning picture I saw on this devise. My Fire Kindle has a beautiful picture but I must admit this Samsung tablet was far more impressive. I would purchase this again in the future if anything happens to this tablet. I have only begun to learn the many facets and capabilities of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Picture is Second to None
customer_reviews.text: At the time, this was the best Tablet out there as far as picture and camera go. I'm still i love with the clarity of the picture. This product is a year or 2 old so other more recent products may be better. But, I highly recommend this particular tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Oldag

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The graphics are astounding
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The graphics are astounding... much sharper than my IPAD 1. It was little difficult to navigate initially, but I am sure that I will master the functions shortly. I keep my tablet with me at all times. I use it for news, internet, Spanish lessons, music & photos. Although I have Apple desktop & lap top computers, my tablet is my main source for computing because of portability. I will keep my IPAD 1 for my grandchild's usage, but hands off my Galaxy S tab.
customer_reviews.author: Cruzinpc

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love the tablet but wish I was able to get the manual to go with it. I have tried to copy it so that I can put it on my TV to look things up while I am working on it. No luck. Having it on my computer is not convenient for me. The tablet does so many things and I'm sure I will appreciate it even more when I can get myself more familiar with it. Have tried to buy the manual but it does not appear to be available from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Freida M. Ehrsam

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, far superior to older models
customer_reviews.text: Fast, better stability than previous models. Lots of features and potential. Miss S pen and screenshot button but otherwise can live without. Kit kat operating system is far superior to earlier operating systems. Noticing some wear on the gold edges so recommend a case if carrying with you outside of your home or office. Battery lasts all day using internet radio and doing email/Facebook etc throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: KFW

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my Tab S
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tab S. I have a small business, and this tablet has helped me in ways a laptop never could. Its portable, its slim, its light and it feels like a high quality. I can easily remote into my work computer, do all the needed work I need to do, then watch Netflix or play games. The screen quality is amazing, the sound quality is amazing and overall I am very satisfied with this tablet. Links very well with other Samsung devices. Some older bluetooth devices won't connect to this with the KitKat operating system, so that does suck. Do buy the Samsung book fold cover, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. I had to de-bloat it and tweak it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I had to de-bloat it and tweak it a little and now it runs ultra-smoothly and the picture is amazing. It's easy to root and install custom kernels and roms (though there are not many to choose from. There are only a couple good roms and one good custom kernel) and the microSD slot is easy to use. I like that it has some empty space under the screen for me to hold while I'm watching a movie/video so I don't have to touch the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: WOW! The display quality is amazing. Very snappy response with good battery life. Setting up Samsung account took some doing but eventually worked (maybe because it was Christmas with lots of registrations, oh well). Wireless works great but Google Play would continuously indicate "unreliable connection" even though the connection was awesome. Connected USB cable to computer to d/l Google Play apps. That was the sole disappointment. Superb in all other areas.
customer_reviews.author: LaptopGuy

customer_reviews.title: I love this than iPad.
customer_reviews.text: Very clear screen than iPad, I added 256GB SD Card (Spend $50) and it works. You can connect it to your smart TV with screen mirroring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Open package and turn on it stared have issues freezing from that point. I returned the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: angela b. whitaker

customer_reviews.title: I like the Android operating system
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for tablet computer, but I didn't want to pay the price for a major brand "pad". I like the Android operating system, as it works very similar to my Android smart phone. Battery life is great, and it works great on both wireless router bands. For the price, it has pretty good performance and features. I love my tablet and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: The on screen keyboard is easy to use and has good spacing for fat finger-types
customer_reviews.text: This handles most all my needs since I do more reading of info than actually typing info other than emails. The on screen keyboard is easy to use and has good spacing for fat finger-types. I put mine in a keyboard folder combo, but I find I would rather use the screen to type emails. I don't need to write school papers or business briefs so the keyboard folder isn't all that useful to me. It works well if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Archie H. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: great tablet, super fast
customer_reviews.text: great tablet, super fast, lightweight, great looking, and one of the best perfomances in the market at the moment i bought it, definetly recomended
customer_reviews.author: Jean Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen
customer_reviews.text: This is just the size I needed I was tired of using my Big lap top for everything
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Aside from this I would recommend this tablet to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on a Friday and had it on Sunday, WOW. I was worried that I had gotten a refurb since it seemed the package was a bit worn but after inspecting and setting it up, I determined that Samsung did a less than stellar factory pack. Aside from this I would recommend this tablet to anyone. Got this on sale for over $100 less since the Tab S 2 is around the corner. The display truly is unlike any other, perfect for movies. I also got the Samsung book case cover in dazzling white. Talk about a perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: Anime_Phreek

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet. The screen is high resolution and looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. The screen is high resolution and looks wonderful with vivid colors. The tablet is very quick and can handle most tasks with ease. The Samsung software is refined and easy to use, for children or adults. Overall I am very satisfied with the purchase and I will be purchasing another soon.
customer_reviews.author: Gil B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet...
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet...Especially since I can increase my memory just by buying a micro SD card and the split screen mode...Great value & easy to use. I have no complaints so far...Those two details are what sold me on the Tab S instead of getting the Apple iPad Air 2. I am an Apple fan, but this tablet was the right one for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: One H*** of a good little computer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a desktop PC that gave up the ghost. I LOVE THIS THING!! It's seriously faster than my ancient PC; the screen produces film & video images that are to die for; and with the bundled Hancom Office suite, it can do almost everything I could do with MS Office, but without paying a king's ransom to Microsoft every year for the privilege. I'm a writer, so I need a computer & word processor that won't have me tearing my hair out. The Samsung Galaxy Tab S (10.5 in) delivers. In spades.
customer_reviews.author: jfredlee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money I spent on it
customer_reviews.text: The lower left corner of the glass is loose and moves away from frame when touched. The battery drains faster than an older IPad. The tablet freezes when touched on the lower right side of screen.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet. I am a Samsung & Android fan anyway but because of this tablet, I havent turned on my laptop in months. There is no need for the laptop. I do everything on this tablet. I have the kindle app so I can read all my books. I have Amazon Prime,Netflix & Huluplus and this tablet streams well. Also the picture is beautiful. Between my Galaxy s5 phone and this tablet I am set.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: I like the android platform much better than IOS
customer_reviews.text: I like the android platform much better than IOS. Great upgrade from my ipad. My biggest issue is with the amazon instant video. If you are running kitkat, you need to download the amazon App Store, the amazon shopping app, then amazon instant video. If you use the amazon for tablet app the instant video will not work, you need the amazon for phone app for it to work properly. Wake up amazon and design a proper app like you did for kindle and ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: OLED SCREEN
customer_reviews.text: OLED screen is best all around. That alone is enough reason to buy this at the discounted price.
customer_reviews.author: Whyking

customer_reviews.title: Cool Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet. Vivid color. This was our first tablet so we're still getting used to it, but so far so good. The only thing I'm not crazy about, (hence 4 stars not 5) is the phone software. I would like to see a more "full service" internet browser and software. As it is, it's just a big phone that you can't make calls on. But still, it's great for some apps. We're remodeling our house and it has been a great tool for pictures and list making, to be able to better communicate with the contractor.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W. Evitts

customer_reviews.title: Crappy repair service
customer_reviews.text: I like the tablet and have nothing to complain about its workings, but when my son dropped it, it became clear that the screen replacement either is $300 for the part - which is hard to get - or I have to go through a Samsung affiliate in California to have it repaired. This may be different if you have a replacement program, but this is a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: J A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device, a little misled by post
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for another of the same model that I broke. Works great, like new. 4 stars bc I was unaware it was a Verizon model
customer_reviews.author: Sarah James

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet! (Briefly!) Don't do it. I took good care of it, and now it's useless. I don't want to spend $500 a year on tablets!
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase. I'm really enjoying my new Samsung Galaxy 10.5 tablet. Update: I bought this tablet in late January 2015. It's now May of 2016. This tablet will not charge with any charger or brick. Is this the life span of a $450 tablet typically? It's evidently the charging port. I'm pissed that I no longer have a tablet since I don't have a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has the iPad and now I have the Galaxy tab and let me tell you, he wants mine now! The graphics are so good, the price is right, and I love the feature that lets me sync my GalaxyS phone to it and it appears on the screen and I can use my phone through the tablet. Awesome! So easy to use, and I feel like I am using my phone on a much bigger scale because everything is exactly the same to change settings, etc. Love it! Great investment!!
customer_reviews.author: themoores89

customer_reviews.title: Great product, after 2 years died.
customer_reviews.text: So I bough this in september 2015, and around september 2017 the charging of the tablet started to suck. It was extremely slow. A month later the screen started flickering and became unusable. This tablet stayed at my house all 2 years, never dropped. 2 years and total fail does not get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ilya ilchenko

customer_reviews.title: Works, arrived early.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early! Seems like it is in good condition and working order 👍 Charged quickly.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet, we went with it because of the processor, my husband it knowledgeable about computers and he would not be able to stand a sub par tablet, so for the price I don't think you can do better. I also thought the camera looks pretty great too. We are really happy with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Robinblythe

customer_reviews.title: 10 tab s
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tablet. Great colors, terrific photos, lots of wi-fi range. The down side is battery life. It needs to be charged every day. My wife has a Samsung tab 4 and gets 36 hours of run time compared to my 4 or 5.
customer_reviews.author: Don Niosi

customer_reviews.title: Other than charging it's great!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY negative trait I have found is that it takes a really long time to charge. I've yet to find out if it supposed to take that long or if it is the charger that is malfunctioning. If I power it off completely and charge it, it only takes a couple of hours. I did get it used. The tablet itself is what I had hoped for: lightweight, large screen, great resolution, decent price. It operates very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine tablet and the merchant provided a like new tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: quality merchant. bought a 128 gb 80 sec memory card for app storage etc also. This is a fine tablet and the merchant provided a like new tablet at a fine price.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Jim

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product but Ive had some issues running apps that ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product but Ive had some issues running apps that keep crashing without any error messages like walking dead video game, samsung watch, papergarden, and a few others despite uninstalling and reinstalling them.
customer_reviews.author: Esa

customer_reviews.title: so reaching the button wasn't easy. It also got a bit warm
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for the orientation of the device. The home button being where it is was very difficult to use. I have small hands, so reaching the button wasn't easy. It also got a bit warm, which I didn't care for.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I've enjoyed installing several browsers on it which gives me the ...
customer_reviews.text: This table works so quickly. And I've been able to use the Kindle app with no problems. I've enjoyed installing several browsers on it which gives me the ability to choose the best browser for the sites that I go to frequently. Samsung has a great product.
customer_reviews.author: breathofliberty

customer_reviews.title: Danger.....Be Careful With Samsung Tablets
customer_reviews.text: Be VERY careful....this tablet "died" about 18 months after purchase and the only option presented by Samsung Customer Service is to return it for $179 + shipping for a technician to just look at it..prepaid!! The tech instructions by the Customer Service rep were 100% bogus
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for viewing comics
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. I use it mainly to read books and comics. I bought it with the intention of using it as a comic book reader and it fit the bill. The size and aspect ratio is the closest you'll get to having a tablet that resembles the dimensions of a physical comic.
customer_reviews.author: Tweenkie

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Makes uncommon noises to indicate activity. We use it as a POS station & the screen size is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: Kicks iPads butt!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love love love this tablet. It is replacing my iPad and so much nicer. I already had a samsung s4 phone and loved it so I knew when it was time to upgrade there was no question. I love that I can use an so card for expandable memory too. One of the biggest reasons I made the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kanuck

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: cant get rid of the main screen which is cellular mobile
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Tablet is very fast, easy to use, great screen. Only drawback is that this tablet and similar Android tablets cannot play videos from Amazon Prime (apparently its an Android thing).
customer_reviews.author: Paige Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I chose this over one from the fruit stand. Very fast. Battery life is ok (it's a huge tablet, so the screen takes a lot of juice). I wish it charged faster, but never really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis & Sara

customer_reviews.title: One of the best screens I've seen on any tablet
customer_reviews.text: One of the best screens I've seen on any tablet. Only my Samsung 26" monitor compares. Very vivid colors, dark is DARK.
customer_reviews.author: S B

customer_reviews.title: Great display and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Samsung tablet and my favorite. It is large enough that the text is still readable at high DPI. Yet small enough to not be too heavy to hold. The contrast and fidelity of the display are incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Amir M.

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with this tablet. Fast, beautiful and the fact that you can increase the memory with a micro SD card is the best thing ever. Has a nice feel, really thin, perfect for movies, shows, games etc.
customer_reviews.author: elvys

customer_reviews.title: I love it. This thing pops
customer_reviews.text: I love it. This thing pops. Very fast. The wife has an I pad. Its good, but I like my Tab S better. I'm replacing an older 1.6g Toshiba laptop with this Tab S. Its 10 times faster than the laptop. Windows and all the popups swamp the laptop. I won't miss windows.
customer_reviews.author: Sandief

customer_reviews.title: Smooth performance and the screen is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tablet on the market right now period! Smooth performance and the screen is amazing! The finger print scanner works great just don't press too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Energy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tablet. Comes with a bit of bloatware but turns out its not a problem. Crisp screen and easy to set up. I am liking it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dagg

customer_reviews.title: Cannot begin to describe the delight, as well as the experience in ordering and ...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot begin to describe the delight, as well as the experience in ordering and receiving this tablet. My first in entering the techo-geek world. Now if I can keep my hands and eyes in the right place...as I am walking...just saying!
customer_reviews.author: N. Sackheim

customer_reviews.title: Exelent screen Super Amoled!
customer_reviews.text: It just looks fantastic. Wow what a difference from a regular tablet vs the galaxy tab S 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Juan Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet. Samsung you got it so right
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet. Samsung you got it so right. Lite manageable size. Awesome sharp clean & crisp colors. Very smooth transition between screens.my favorite device.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality images
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality images. Easy functionality. This relates to all tablets, I hate when they download apps that cannot be deleted. They take up space you could use for apps you want to download. I have an Acer A200 with the same issue. My Samsung is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Berry

customer_reviews.title: A good product. I only wish that it lasted longer ...
customer_reviews.text: A good product.I only wish that it lasted longer before recharging.
customer_reviews.author: Ez

customer_reviews.title: Could not use on data
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what i wanted far as being able use on mobile data/wifi company lied (was not Amazon)
customer_reviews.author: Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not quire a full replacement for a laptop, but very, very close.
customer_reviews.author: David Ray Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: ... I have to say it was one of the best decisions I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time researching different tablets and after 3 months decided on this one and I have to say it was one of the best decisions I have ever made. The screen display is spectacular. It is not that hard learning how to use it. I love this tablet
customer_reviews.author: Lillian M.Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. The quality of the picture is a 5 star. I have a Galaxy5 phone and the ease of using this tablet is great. I am very happy with the ease of using this and the quality of the tablet. Also got the key board .
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Karen Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5 about 2 months now and I love it! It's very thin and the screen size is great. The only problem I've had so far is the screen was glitching when i first got it but it only happened a couple times and hasn't happened since. This is my first tablet so I can't compare it to others but it seems like it's a good one for the price range. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: SMonroe3

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It - iPad Collecting Dust
customer_reviews.text: Bought as birthday gift for my wife who had an iPad. Guess what, the iPad does not get turned on anymore! Stunning graphics and so thin and light. Fast and responsive!
customer_reviews.author: MikeH

customer_reviews.title: Plug it in at night
customer_reviews.text: Great functionality, but it takes an eternity to charge. Despite good battery life (3-4 days of moderate use), it takes 7-8 hours to acquire a full battery.
customer_reviews.author: herussell9

customer_reviews.title: The only way to do it.
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm Samsung all the way. I have fond them to be excellent and I have several. There was a time when I would only buy Sony but now it is Samsung. Really great tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Its been day one that ive had this and well lets just say that although it is super thin it resists a fall from my kitchen table. I was scared once I picked it up from thw floor but then suprised when I saw not even a scratch on it! Overall its great the screen quality and size is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: estivaliz

customer_reviews.title: My First Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My first tablet - since all my cell phones are,we're Samsung, this was an obvious choice. The tablet is so much simpler to use than a laptop and the quality and ease of use is exactly what I've come to expect from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnne

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The display is a very nice size, clear and sharp. The tablet is very lightweight. I've been using it for 2 months now and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: We were in the market for either a new lap top or a tablet. We decided to get this because it had great reviews and was light, slim, and easy to carry around where ever I go. This tablet has great battery life and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G Zuilkowski

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected and more...........
customer_reviews.text: Incredible screen resolution. Better than my HD laptop screen. Super thin and lightweight. Quick response and just as easy to use as any other Android device. Not too much bloatware. Added 128GB SD card to store TV shows, Movies, Videos for offline viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely clear screen. I need a keyboard for sure with this. It's a little slow though, especially with the internet. That's probably my biggest complaint about this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is the Best.
customer_reviews.text: Samsung has done it again. Speed...picture...quality. After owning this, you couldn't give me an iPad. I love it. It pairs easily with my S5 and my Samsung Smart TV. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The screen resolution is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my sons. 6 months later and they still use them every single day. The screen resolution is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JD5000

customer_reviews.title: Samsung knocked it out of the park
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tablet. everything about it is first rate. Fast, superb display, the camera is also excellent. I went for the Logitech keyboard with this and it just takes it to another level. We've had it for about a month and there's been absolutely no issues with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I love it. My granddaughter had to put some of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My granddaughter had to put some of the apps on it for me, but it has a beautifully clear picture, fast processor, and plays videos better than my pc. I recommend it wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Overturf

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted past one year!
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine 13 months now and it is going on the fritz!! Very disppointed!
customer_reviews.author: Supre

customer_reviews.title: This is such a beautiful tablet.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful tablet... I really like Samsung products... I am very happy with my purchase, but I would just like to mention this tablet does not have a sim card slot... It is WIFI only...
customer_reviews.author: VALERIE PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: This tablet seems to be better than the newest tab s 2
customer_reviews.text: This tablet seems to be better than the newest tab s 2, at least in respects to the specs. I can only attest to that because the newest Galaxy has not yet been released.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the android lover
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase made for someone else. Gets used daily by a college student and so far it has passed with flying colors for all their uses.
customer_reviews.author: AMasterofMayheM

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tablet for over 3 months now & its amazing...I have zero complaints about it at all, the resolution is better than the ipad air 2, with removable storage so I decided on the galaxy tab instead.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: A true iPad competitor
customer_reviews.text: For the first in a while there is a device worthy of being a true competitor to the iPad. It's light, super thin, feels great in the hands and the screen is the best on the market. I was blown away by the depth of colours and how super sharp everything looks on this screen. Performance wise it's not bad and my only regret now is not buying the 32 GB as I am already grappling for space due to the Samsung bloatware.
customer_reviews.author: Omar McKoy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet with awesome features. Having some issues with it freezing up. Otherwise great!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing screen and super fast processor!
customer_reviews.text: I can't put the Samsung Galaxy Tab S down. Its amazing processing speed can handle anything you throw at it and looks amzing on this amoled display!
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet on the market. Period.
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet on the market. Period. If I have to find something to complain, I guess it's the speakers. They could be a little louder. :)
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: We love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: We love this tablet. If you have a Galaxy S5, this tablet is exactly like it in function. Does essentially the same thing without the phone. Great screen!
customer_reviews.author: Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the Samsung Galaxy 7.0 Plus. I love the bigger screen, the colors and the vibrancy. While I'm still learning it I am enjoying reading my books on a larger screen or even watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5-Inch Tablet (16 GB, Dazzling White)
product_meta.description:
AT A GLANCE:
 * Super AMOLED 10.5-inch display for bright and vivid graphics
 * Use two apps at the same time with Multi Window
 * Rear and front cameras for photos and video chat
 * Lightweight, ultra-thin design for portability
 * Add up to 128 GB memory with microSD slot
 * Fingerprint scanner for security
 * Share tablet with Multi-User and Kids Modes
 * Up to nine hours of battery life, and even more with Ultra Power Saving mode

EXPERIENCE IMMERSIVE ENTERTAINMENT WITH SUPER AMOLED DISPLAY
SUPER AMOLED DISPLAY DELIVERS VIVID GRAPHICS
Enjoy rich graphics and clear text while you watch movies, play games, or read books on the large 10.5-inch screen. With twice the resolution of an HDTV, the Super AMOLED display provides vivid images and extra-crisp contrast.

USE TWO APPS SIDE BY SIDE WITH MULTI WINDOW FEATURE
Do more on your tablet with the Multi Window feature. It conveniently allows you to use two apps, side-by-side, and drag content from one window to the other. Listen to music and browse for lyrics, type emails while referencing other documents, or compare content on two websites at the same time.

BUILT-IN CAMERAS FOR PHOTOS AND VIDEO CHAT
Equipped with an 8-megapixel rear camera and a 2.1-megapixel front camera, the Galaxy Tab S lets you take high-quality photos and video chat with friends and family members.

THIN, LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN AND EXPANDABLE MEMORY
LIGHTWEIGHT TABLET IS EASY TO CARRY
The Galaxy Tab S is Samsung's thinnest and lightest tablet yet. Measuring just 0.26 inches thin and weighing only 1 pound, the Galaxy Tab S is easy to carry and hold as you watch movies and play games.

SLEEK, STYLISH DESIGN
Proudly show off the sleek, polished design of the Galaxy Tab S. Choose between dazzling white or titanium bronze for entertainment with a stylish look.

EXPANDABLE MEMORY TO STORE PHOTOS, MUSIC, AND VIDEOS
The tablet offers 16 GB of onboard memory and includes a microSD card slot that allows you to add up to 128 GB of memory, making it easy to store more songs, videos, photos, and games.

Enjoy movies and games on the brilliant 4-million pixel display. View Larger.

Use two apps side by side. View Larger.

Multi-User Mode allows up to eight total profiles. View Larger.

INNOVATIONS FOR EVERYDAY CONVENIENCE
FINGERPRINT SCANNER FOR SECURITY
Keep your tablet and your content secure with the swipe of a finger. The fingerprint scanner captures and stores your fingerprints, so you can easily unlock your tablet and prevent unwanted access. If more than one person uses the tablet, the fingerprint scanner will automatically unlock the specific multi-user profile.

SHARE YOUR TABLET WITH MULTI-USER AND KIDS MODES
Great for sharing your tablet with family members, Multi-User Mode lets you add up to eight profiles including your own. This allows up to eight different users to log in separately, so you each see only your own apps, backgrounds, and email. Children can use Kids Mode, a colorful and fun interface that parents can customize with kids' apps and time limits.

ULTRA POWER SAVING MODE MAXIMIZES BATTERY LIFE
Avoid draining your battery with the Ultra Power Saving Mode. It turns your screen to black and white and shuts off nonessential apps to prolong battery life when you need it most.

EXTRA FEATURES FOR A SEAMLESS SAMSUNG GALAXY EXPERIENCE
SHARE, SYNC, AND EDIT WITH EASE
Make and receive calls, send and receive text messages, and view and control your Samsung Galaxy S 5 directly from your Galaxy Tab S with SideSync. If you're away from the office and need to get work done, you can access, edit, and save documents using Hancom Office. Smart Switch makes it easy to upgrade to a new device by effortlessly moving your contacts, photos, and media.

LISTEN TO AD-FREE RADIO WITH MILKMUSIC
Choose from over 200 radio stations to hear music you love with MilkMusic, an ad-free radio service exclusive to Galaxy owners and powered by Slacker. Use the interactive dial to surf stations and select genres to play through the tablet's built-in stereo speakers. Adjust preferences and create your own stations for a personalized listening experience, with no lag time between songs.

MAGAZINES COME TO LIFE
Flip through your favorite sports, fashion, and news magazines in Papergarden. You'll easily navigate through your favorite reads and see everything at a resolution that's optimized for your Galaxy Tab S screen, so photography looks stunning and text is easy to read.

RECEIVE PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS WITH WATCHON AND USE YOUR TABLET AS A REMOTE CONTROL
The WatchON feature lets you type in your zip code and cable provider to browse and search current TV listings and get personalized recommendations based on your viewing history. The built in IR blaster allows you to use your tablet as a universal remote control.

GALAXY GIFTS
The Galaxy Tab S also comes with Galaxy Gifts that enable you to get the most out of your tablet with premium content and service offerings. To get all the available offers, go to the Galaxy Gifts widget on your Tab S.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5, USB charging cable, wall adapter, and quick start guide.

Fingerprint scanner unlocks your specific multi-user profile. View Larger.



AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Android 4.4 Kit Kat OS, 1.9 GHz Exynos 5 Octa Processor (1.9 GHz Quad Core + 1.3 GHz Quad Core)
16 GB Flash Memory, 3 GB RAM Memory
Camera: 8MP Rear with LED Flash + 2.1MP Front
Super AMOLED Display with 2560x1600 WQXGA Resolution
Features Ultra Power Saving Mode and Fingerprint Scanner
